Why Trade Share CFDs instead of shares?

One of the biggest benefits of trading CFDs on shares is that you’ll be able to gain full exposure to the movement of stock prices with a small initial deposit.

Use leverage, less initial investment.

Two-way trading with high flexibility.

Commission-free.

Share CFDs Trading Example

BUY:APPLE INC(NASDAQ:AAPL)

CFD trade

Share trade

Sell/Buy Price

122.52/122.67

122.52/122.67

Deal

Buy at 122.67

Buy at 122.67

Funds available (Blance)

$3,000

$3,000

Leverage

5:1

1:1

Deal Size

100 shares(1 contract)

20 shares

Funds requires to open a trade

$2,453=100 shares x $122.67 Buy price x 20% margin

$2,453=20 shares x $122.67 Buy price

Close Price

Sell 100 shares at 129.52

Sell 20 shares at 129.52

Profit

$665 = ($129.52-$122.67)*100 shares - 20 rebate

$137 = ($129.52-$122.67)*20 shares
